description: Try our easy to follow Baked Italian Meatballs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork dishes,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Budget,Quick & easy dinner,Wheat free,Pork,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Baked Italian Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Heat oil in a large flameproof frying pan over high heat. Add meatballs and cook, turning occasionally, for 3 minutes or until browned.
Add passata and bring to the boil. Remove pan from heat.
Scatter bocconcini over meatballs. Bake for 15 minutes or until meatballs are cooked through and cheese has melted.
Scatter over basil and season with pepper. Serve.
